Article.ArticleTitle: Investigating the Interplay between Olfaction, Social Behaviour, and Individual Differences: Editorial.

Abstract.AbstractText: Long-COVID mercilessly brought awareness to what olfaction researchers have known all along; losing your sense of smell changes your experiences with the world around you and can compromise your health and wellbeing [...].

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Psychology, School of Public Health, Southern Medical University, Guangzhou 510515, China.
School of Psychological Sciences, Macquarie University, Sydney, NSW 2109, Australia.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: The authors declare no conflicts of interest.
